General.Name: Nordwest Handel AG
General.Description: Nordwest Handel AG provides procurement, logistics, and sales services. It offers garage, house, wooden internal, industrial, metal, smoke protection, and security doors; meshes, awnings, gates and drive, staircases, and roof windows; and barrier materials, building site equipment, construction and compressed air tools, buckets and bins, forestry equipment, loppers, hedge clippers, shredders, gardening and landscaping, bitumen and asphalt equipment, mixers, shovels, wheelbarrows, steel nails, and handles. The company also offers automatic door systems, hinges and accessories, letterboxes, hardware items, electric door openers, window and ventilation, escape route safety systems, railing and shelving systems, wooden connectors, furniture and skylight fittings, wheels and castors, sliding gate and gate fittings, lock and security, door and gate fittings, door locking and surveying, safes, access control, and cylinders; fastening chemicals, dowels, wood and chipboard screws, and heavy load fastening; and steel products. In addition, it provides work and clothing, first aid equipment, protective footwear, hand and skin protection, cleaning and care, head and eye respiratory protection and ear defenders, personal protective equipment, and environment and heat-protection; cordless and power tools, metal processing, woodworking, cleaning devices, generators, gardening and landscaping construction, and measuring systems; and machining, clamping devices, surface, soldering and welding, workshop supplies, technical trade, industrial suppliers/operating equipment, construction equipment, work safety, and power and compressed air tools. Further, it offers folding rules, tape measures, spirit levels, angle finders, laser measuring, and stopwatches; and marketing services. It sells its products under the Promat and Delphis brands. The company was founded in 1919 and is based in Dortmund, Germany. Nordwest Handel AG operates as a subsidiary of Dr. Helmut Rothenberger Holding GmbH.
